'''Square Pine Tea Table''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Square Pine Tea Table is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Pine Wood = 8
|Yellow Dye = 2
|Red Dye = 2
|sort = Pine Wood;Yellow Dye;Red Dye
}}
